content: the simple pyry mohair beanie is knitted with double yarn tukuwool fingering is accompanied by lace-weight silk mohair yarn approx 70 g tukuwool fingering 100 % finnish wool 370 m / 100 g pictured in shade 44 matcha approx 20 g filcolana tilia 70 % mohair 30 % silk 210 m / 100 g pictured in shade 367 lemongrass size 1 2 3 4 circumference 35 38 5 41 5 44 5 cm gauge ribbing 27 sts x 30 r = 10 cm x 10 cm on 3 5 mm needles after washing needles 3 mm/40 cm& 3 5 mm/40 cm or dpns 3 mm ja 3 5 mm notions 5 stitch markers
